document.full_text: - heavy snow blanketed japan's devastated northeast on wednesday, hindering rescue workers and adding to the woes of the few, mainly elderly, residents who remained in the area worst hit by last week's massive earthquake and tsunami.
document.title: snow muffles rescue work in japan's devastated northeast
lines_and_colors: - heavy snow blanketed japan's devastated northeast on wednesday, hindering rescue workers and adding to the woes of the few, mainly elderly, residents who remained in the area worst hit by last week's massive earthquake and tsunami.
